title: Taking the Bus
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 46 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: Have you ever ridden on a public bus to get from one place to another? Students will follow the steps of a young girl as she takes the bus to school with her mother. Supportive photographs, simple repetitive sentences, and high-frequency words will help beginning readers to be successful as they read this informative book.
meta: bus, pay, ride, school, wait, walk
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /w/
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word I

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
